lines.text: Maybe we could conduct a police investigation.
Y'know, with... professionals. Like forensic experts who do their jobs.
I-I don't know what you mean.
Like, as opposed to one person doing all the heavy lifting?
While the ''detective'' stands around waiting for me to do his job for him?
Maybe we could even be allowed to touch evidence without some petty drama as a pretext to justify it!
Look, we do things by the book around here.
And as it happens, the book is a thousand pages long and written mainly by committees...
...most of whom were tryin' to sabotage each other and appease organized crime.
You have no idea how tied my hands are, kid.
